clingy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who is clingy is too dependent on another person, and will often hold on to them – used to show disapproval
clingy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: clingy clothing or material sticks tightly to your body and shows its shape – use this to show approval
clingy.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: She wore a clingy red dress.
